com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps

Class TypeSteps<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.AbstractSteps<TypeStep<T>>
      • com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.steps.TypeSteps<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the Testdata.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statusable

    public class TypeSteps<T>
extends AbstractSteps<TypeStep<T>>
    Describes a scenario with only one data set.
    Thus, it has the given, when, then, and methods. To execute it, see the AbstractSteps.test() method.
    Author:
    ckeiner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TypeSteps()
      Creates new steps with an empty list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TypeSteps<T> and(Steps scenario)
      Adds all steps of the specified Steps to the AbstractSteps.steps.
      TypeSteps<T> and(java.lang.String description, java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
      Adds the step specified by the description and consumer to the AbstractSteps.steps.
      The keyword of the TypeStep is And.

      The keyword of the Step is And.

      Adds all steps of the specified TypeSteps to the steps.
      Note, that the generic type of the parameter has to fit the generic type of this class.
